name: Design for Change Singapore
description: Design for Change (DFC) is the world’s largest movement of children and youth driving change by unleashing their ‘I CAN’ mindset. We design school programs and special projects to give the young an opportunity to express their own ideas for a more desirable and sustainable future. Design for Change has been selected by the United Nations as one of the initiatives to achieve the Global Goals for Sustainable Development, recognising that children have what it takes to drive change in the world.
features: We embrace all cultures, religions, causes, languages, genders and ages.
We are shamelessly committed to the pursuit of infecting every child in the world with the power of ‘I CAN’.
We are optimistic that the world can be a better place and change is possible.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Empowering children to shape a more desirable and sustainable world, by unleashing their I CAN mindset, by design.
ShortDescription: Design for Change (DFC) is the world’s largest movement of children and youth driving change by unleashing their ‘I CAN’ mindset.
enhanced_description: Design for Change (DFC) Singapore is a global movement focused on empowering children and youth by cultivating an 'I CAN' mindset. The initiative designs and delivers school programs and special projects that provide young individuals with opportunities to express and develop their own ideas for a more desirable and sustainable future. Recognized by the United Nations for its contribution to the Global Goals for Sustainable Development, DFC aims to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency among its participants. The movement is committed to inclusivity, embracing all cultures, religions, causes, languages, genders, and ages, driven by an optimistic belief in the possibility of positive change.
key_use_cases: Fostering skill development and acquisition in children and youth
Enhancing learning efficiency among young participants
Cultivating an 'I CAN' mindset for empowerment and agency
Encouraging the development of ideas for a sustainable future
Implementing educational programs within school environments
Driving special projects focused on youth-led change
competitive_advantages: Positioned as the world's largest movement of children and youth driving change
Selected by the United Nations as an initiative to achieve Global Goals for Sustainable Development
Strong emphasis on unleashing an 'I CAN' mindset
Commitment to inclusivity across all cultures, religions, causes, languages, genders, and ages
Optimistic and proactive approach to enabling global change
primary_users: Learning and Development departments (potential corporate clients/sponsors, inferred from categorization)
